verses.verse: And Elisha <S%H477><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Gird <S%H2296><s%> up your loins, <S%H4975><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> box <S%H6378><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and go <S%H3212><s%> to Ramothgilead: <S%H7433><s%>

And when you come <S%H935><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> look <S%H7200><s%> out there <S%H8033><s%> Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nimshi, <S%H5250><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> in, and make him arise <S%H6965><s%> up from among <S%H8432><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and carry <S%H935><s%> him to an inner <S%H2315><s%> chamber; <S%H2315><s%>

Then take <S%H3947><s%> the box <S%H6378><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> it on <S%H5921><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have anointed <S%H4886><s%> you king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Then open <S%H6605><s%> the door, <S%H1817><s%> and flee, <S%H5127><s%> and tarry <S%H2442><s%> not.
So the young <S%H5288><s%> man, even the young <S%H5288><s%> man the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Ramothgilead. <S%H7433><s%>

And when he came, <S%H935><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H2428><s%> were sitting; <S%H3427><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> I have an errand <S%H1697><s%> to you, O captain. <S%H8269><s%> And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> To which <S%H4310><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> us? And he said, <S%H559><s%> To you, O captain. <S%H8269><s%>

And he arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into the house; <S%H1004><s%> and he poured <S%H3332><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> on <S%H413><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I have anointed <S%H4886><s%> you king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H413><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even over <S%H413><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And you shall smite <S%H5221><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ahab <S%H256><s%> your master, <S%H113><s%> that I may avenge <S%H5358><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my servants <S%H5650><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the servants <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jezebel. <S%H348><s%>

For the whole <S%H3605><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Ahab <S%H256><s%> shall perish: <S%H6><s%> and I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off from Ahab <S%H256><s%> him that urinates <S%H8366><s%> against the wall, <S%H7023><s%> and him that is shut <S%H6113><s%> up and left in Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ahab <S%H256><s%> like the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nebat, <S%H5028><s%> and like the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahijah: <S%H281><s%>

And the dogs <S%H3611><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> Jezebel <S%H348><s%> in the portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> and there shall be none <S%H369><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> her. And he opened <S%H6605><s%> the door, <S%H1817><s%> and fled. <S%H5127><s%>

Then Jehu <S%H3058><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to the servants <S%H5650><s%> of his lord: <S%H113><s%> and one said <S%H559><s%> to him, Is all well? <S%H7965><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> came <S%H935><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> mad <S%H7696><s%> fellow to you? And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, You know <S%H3045><s%> the man, <S%H376><s%> and his communication. <S%H7879><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> It is false; <S%H8267><s%> tell <S%H559><s%> us now. <S%H4994><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H2063><s%> and thus <S%H2063><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> he to me, saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have anointed <S%H4886><s%> you king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H413><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then they hurried, <S%H4116><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his garment, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it under <S%H8478><s%> him on <S%H413><s%> the top <S%H1634><s%> of the stairs, <S%H4609><s%> and blew <S%H8628><s%> with trumpets, <S%H7782><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Jehu <S%H3058><s%> is king. <S%H4427><s%>

So Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nimshi <S%H5250><s%> conspired <S%H7194><s%> against <S%H413><s%> Joram. <S%H3141><s%> (Now Joram <S%H3141><s%> had kept <S%H8104><s%> Ramothgilead, <S%H7433><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of Hazael <S%H2371><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria. <S%H758><s%>

But king <S%H4428><s%> Joram <S%H3088><s%> was returned <S%H7725><s%> to be healed <S%H7495><s%> in Jezreel <S%H3157><s%> of the wounds <S%H4347><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Syrians <S%H761><s%> had given <S%H5221><s%> him, when he fought <S%H3898><s%> with Hazael <S%H2371><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Syria. <S%H758><s%>) And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> it be your minds, <S%H5315><s%> then let none <S%H408><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> nor escape <S%H6412><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> it in Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

So Jehu <S%H3058><s%> rode <S%H7392><s%> in a chariot, <S%H7393><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Jezreel; <S%H3157><s%> for Joram <S%H3141><s%> lay <S%H7901><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%> And Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> Joram. <S%H3141><s%>

And there stood <S%H5975><s%> a watchman <S%H6822><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> in Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> and he spied <S%H7200><s%> the company <S%H8229><s%> of Jehu <S%H3058><s%> as he came, <S%H935><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%> a company. <S%H8229><s%> And Joram <S%H3088><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> an horseman, <S%H7395><s%> and send <S%H7971><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them, and let him say, <S%H559><s%> Is it peace? <S%H7965><s%>

So there went <S%H3212><s%> one on horseback <S%H7392><s%> <S%H5483><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Is it peace? <S%H7965><s%> And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have you to do with peace? <S%H7965><s%> turn <S%H5437><s%> you behind <S%H310><s%> me. And the watchman <S%H6822><s%> told, <S%H5046><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The messenger <S%H4397><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to them, but he comes <S%H7725><s%> not again. <S%H7725><s%>

Then he sent <S%H7971><s%> out a second <S%H8145><s%> on horseback, <S%H5483><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> to them, and said, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Is it peace? <S%H7965><s%> And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> answered, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have you to do with peace? <S%H7965><s%> turn <S%H5437><s%> you behind <S%H310><s%> me.

And the watchman <S%H6822><s%> told, <S%H5046><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> He came <S%H935><s%> even to them, and comes <S%H7725><s%> not again: <S%H7725><s%> and the driving <S%H4491><s%> is like the driving <S%H4491><s%> of Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nimshi; <S%H5250><s%> for he drives <S%H5090><s%> furiously. <S%H7697><s%>

And Joram <S%H3088><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Make ready. <S%H631><s%> And his chariot <S%H7393><s%> was made ready. <S%H631><s%> And Joram <S%H3088><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out, each <S%H376><s%> in his chariot, <S%H7393><s%> and they went <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> Jehu, <S%H3058><s%> and met <S%H4672><s%> him in the portion <S%H2513><s%> of Naboth <S%H5022><s%> the Jezreelite. <S%H3158><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Joram <S%H3088><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Jehu, <S%H3058><s%> that he said, <S%H559><s%> Is it peace, <S%H7965><s%> Jehu? <S%H3058><s%> And he answered, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> so long <S%H5704><s%> as the prostitutions <S%H2183><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%> Jezebel <S%H348><s%> and her witchcrafts <S%H3785><s%> are so many? <S%H7227><s%>
And Joram <S%H3088><s%> turned <S%H2015><s%> his hands, <S%H3027><s%> and fled, <S%H5127><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Ahaziah, <S%H274><s%> There is treachery, <S%H4820><s%> O Ahaziah. <S%H274><s%>

And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> drew a bow <S%H7198><s%> with his full <S%H4390><s%> strength, <S%H3027><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> Jehoram <S%H3088><s%> between <S%H996><s%> his arms, <S%H2220><s%> and the arrow <S%H2678><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out at his heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he sunk <S%H3766><s%> down in his chariot. <S%H7393><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jehu to Bidkar <S%H920><s%> his captain, <S%H7991><s%> Take <S%H5375><s%> up, and cast <S%H7993><s%> him in the portion <S%H2513><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> of Naboth <S%H5022><s%> the Jezreelite: <S%H3158><s%> for remember <S%H2142><s%> how that, when I and you rode <S%H7392><s%> together <S%H6776><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Ahab <S%H256><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> laid <S%H5375><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> burden <S%H4853><s%> on him;

Surely I have seen <S%H7200><s%> yesterday <S%H570><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of Naboth, <S%H5022><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and I will requite <S%H7999><s%> you in this <S%H2063><s%> plat, <S%H2513><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore take <S%H5375><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> him into the plat <S%H2513><s%> of ground, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

But when Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> this, he fled <S%H5127><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the garden <S%H1588><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%> And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> followed <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Smite <S%H5221><s%> him also <S%H1571><s%> in the chariot. <S%H4818><s%> And they did so at the going <S%H4608><s%> up to Gur, <S%H1483><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by Ibleam. <S%H2991><s%> And he fled <S%H5127><s%> to Megiddo, <S%H4023><s%> and died <S%H4191><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And his servants <S%H5650><s%> carried <S%H7392><s%> him in a chariot to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and buried <S%H6912><s%> him in his sepulcher <S%H6900><s%> with his fathers <S%H1><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>

And in the eleventh <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Joram <S%H3088><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahab <S%H256><s%> began Ahaziah <S%H274><s%> to reign <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And when Jehu <S%H3058><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> to Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> Jezebel <S%H348><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it; and she painted <S%H7760><s%> <S%H6320><s%> her face, <S%H5869><s%> and tired <S%H3190><s%> her head, <S%H7218><s%> and looked <S%H8259><s%> out at <S%H1157><s%> a window. <S%H2474><s%>
And as Jehu <S%H3058><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> in at the gate, <S%H8179><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> Had Zimri <S%H2174><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> who slew <S%H2026><s%> his master? <S%H113><s%>

And he lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his face <S%H6440><s%> to the window, <S%H2474><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is on <S%H854><s%> my side? who? <S%H4310><s%> And there looked <S%H8259><s%> out to him two <S%H8147><s%> or three <S%H7969><s%> eunuchs. <S%H5631><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Throw <S%H8058><s%> her down. <S%H8058><s%> So they threw <S%H8058><s%> her down: <S%H8058><s%> and some of her blood <S%H1818><s%> was sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the wall, <S%H7023><s%> and on <S%H413><s%> the horses: <S%H5483><s%> and he stepped <S%H7429><s%> her under foot.

And when he was come <S%H935><s%> in, he did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Go, <S%H6485><s%> see now <S%H4994><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> cursed <S%H779><s%> woman, and bury <S%H6912><s%> her: for she is a king's <S%H4428><s%> daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

And they went <S%H3212><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> her: but they found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> of her than <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the skull, <S%H1538><s%> and the feet, <S%H7272><s%> and the palms <S%H3709><s%> of her hands. <S%H3027><s%>

Why they came <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> him. And he said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H1931><s%> is the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> by his servant <S%H5650><s%> Elijah <S%H452><s%> the Tishbite, <S%H8664><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> In the portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jezreel <S%H3157><s%> shall dogs <S%H3611><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of Jezebel: <S%H348><s%>

And the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of Jezebel <S%H348><s%> shall be as dung <S%H1828><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> in the portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jezreel; <S%H3157><s%> so that they shall not say, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is Jezebel. <S%H348><s%>
